notes.text: Security update for subversion
notes.title: Title of the patch

notes.text:
Subversion has been updated to fix a security problem:

    * bnc#889849: Reveal authentication information through an md5
      collision attack on authentication realm (CVE-2014-3528)

Security Issues:

    * CVE-2014-3528
      <http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2014-3528>
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The mod_dav_svn Apache HTTPD server module in Subversion 1.6.x before 1.6.21 and 1.7.0 through 1.7.8 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) by (1) setting or (2) deleting a large number of properties for a file or directory.
